word_group.brief_definition: 壮观景象；气势壮观；壮观场面

bilingual.source: The course also uses spectacular National Geographic photography.
bilingual.target: 该课程还使用了壮观的国家地理摄影作品。

bilingual.source: The city at night is a spectacular sight.
bilingual.target: 夜晚的城市是一个壮观的景象。

bilingual.source: The sunset over the ocean was spectacular.
bilingual.target: 海上日落的景色是壮观的。

bilingual.source: The Venetian carnival is a spectacular event.
bilingual.target: 威尼斯的狂欢节是一个壮观的活动。
马戏团的表演真是壮观的。

bilingual.source: The rocket's blastoff was a spectacular sight.
bilingual.target: 火箭的发射是一道壮观的景象。

bilingual.source: The concert culminates in a spectacular finale.
bilingual.target: 音乐会达到高潮，以壮观的结尾结束。

bilingual.source: The fireworks display had a spectacular finale.
bilingual.target: 烟花表演有一个壮观的终曲。

bilingual.source: The fireworks ignited in a spectacular display.
bilingual.target: 烟花在一场壮观的表演中点燃了。

bilingual.source: You can see a spectacular sunrise on Mount Emei.
bilingual.target: 在峨眉山上可以看到壮观的日出。

yingyinNormal.en: Joey come, I can't believe, I bring you here to see the Bapstein-King comet, one of nature's most spectacular phenomenon.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不能相信，我带你们来看巴布斯坦王慧星，大自然最壮观的现象之一。

yingyinNormal.en: Here Asia's three greatest rivers run side by side, creating a spectacular landscape, from alpine peaks to steamy valleys.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在这里，亚洲的三条最伟大的河流肩并肩的流淌着，形成了壮观的风景，有高高的山峰和云雾缭绕的山谷。

yingyinNormal.en: Wilson has mapped out a spectacular show, so he's making sure they are positioned perfectly to go off at the right place and time.
yingyinNormal.zh: 威尔森计划了一次壮观的演出，因此他要确保烟花放置准确，在正确的地方和时间升空。

yingyinNormal.en: The radio interview you did was spectacular.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你在电台访问中的表现太出彩了。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh! Oh, spectacular! I'm so proud of you boys.
yingyinNormal.zh: 太感人了！我为你们感到骄傲，小家伙们。

yingyinNormal.en: Must've been a spectacular view. She's quite a girl.
yingyinNormal.zh: 上面的景色一定特别美妙。她是个好姑娘。

yingyinNormal.en: I think Serena's graces are pretty spectacular as they are.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我觉得瑟琳娜跟他们一样拥有优雅的气质。

yingyinNormal.en: Because what the algorithms gave us was extremely spectacular. Even Kip was surprised.
yingyinNormal.zh: 因为数学算法所提供给我们的，非常壮观。甚至基普都感到惊讶。

yingyinNormal.en: Its dramatic cityscapes cling to the hillsides and the edges of its spectacular harbor.
yingyinNormal.zh: 它拥有令人惊叹的城市景观，为附近的山岭和壮丽的海港，构成一幅独一无二的景观。

yingyinNormal.en: You see one of the many spectacular things my mutation allows me to do is that I can read your mind.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的变异让我能做的许多了不起的事情之一是我能读懂你的想法。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, I can breathe again. Babe, they want to have sex. Oh, of course! The annual birthday booty spectacular!
yingyinNormal.zh: 好了，我又能呼吸了。亲爱的，他们想做爱。当然啊，年度生日庆祝打炮大典！

yingyinNormal.en: Then I was in the chorus of the Radio City Music Hall Christmas Spectacular. I auditioned for Annie on Broadway.
yingyinNormal.zh: 后来，我参加了无线电城音乐厅的圣诞节目，在百老汇配过音。

yingyinNormal.en: What should be the most wonderful day of my life is rapidly turning into just Sunday with a spectacular amount of food.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一生中最快乐的日子，变成被食物淹死的星期天。

yingyinNormal.en: The barges carrying Wilson's monkey face fireworks are over three in position. You couldn't hope for a more spectacular setting.
yingyinNormal.zh: 装载威尔森猴脸烟花的船已全部到位。没有比这里更好的景色了。

yingyinNormal.en: Soon, the party will move across town for my sunrise spectacular. Miguel, you must come to the show. You will be my guest of honor.
yingyinNormal.zh: 派对马上就要开始了，就在镇子对面，我举办的日出演唱会，那米格尔，你一定要来看我的演唱会，你是我的特邀嘉宾。

yingyinNormal.en: Music and light bringing dreams to life? Precisely. Well, it's just like you remember it. In fact, I've made it even more spectacular.
yingyinNormal.zh: 音乐和灯光将梦想带入现实，美仑美央。剧院现在还是风采依旧。而且，我把它打造得更棒了。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, my guy is spectacular. Okay? He's a massage client and one time, when he was on the table, I looked at it. And I mean all of it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我这个的身材很赞，他是我的客人，有一次他在按摩台上，就被我看光光了。

yingyinNormal.en: I've been a little focused on magic bubble duty, and as you can see by the lack of magic in Mystic Falls, it's a spectacular fail of a mission.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我一直在想办法解决反魔法场的问题，而从神秘瀑布镇如今还是零魔法就能看出。

yingyinNormal.en: Perched on the East Coast of Australia, few cities are as geographically spectacular as Sydney, the capital of the state of New South Wales, and home to over four and a half million people.
yingyinNormal.zh: 很少城市可以像悉尼一样，处于优越的地理位置。悉尼座落于澳洲东岸，是新南韦尔斯州的首府，人口超过四百五十万。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

adj. 戴眼镜的；有眼镜状斑纹的

an event produced on a large scale and with striking effects

数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>

examination_example.sentence: Some of these <highlight>spectacular</highlight> churches are no more than small buildings, barely four metres wide and six metres tall.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 其中一些壮观的教堂不过是小建筑，只有四米宽和六米高。

数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。
